channel.title: lunar journal on
channel.description: Recent content in lunar journal on

item.title: heat moon 2021
item.description: new moon my intention this month is to get more prepared for the commitment party. still need to get my dress, shoes, and make the centerpieces for the tables.

item.title: snake moon 2021
item.description: may 11: new moon this month is going to be all about preparing for our trial in mid-june! i’d like to spend some time in crowded, unfamiliar places to get loki used to that kind of thing.

item.title: pollen moon 2021
item.description: april 11: new moon intention: get loki ready for competition! april 16: waxing crescent had a great lesson with alison; can’t wait to go back next week!
